channel.title: What server source would be best for me based off of this information
channel.description:
What server source would be best for me based off of this information:
[ul][li]a server that is a 317[/li] [li]one that has working god sword emotes[/li][/ul]
Help would also be appreciated [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,335621.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,335621.0.html[/url] and [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,335298.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,335298.0.html[/url] and [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=post;msg=2610290;topic=335622.0;sesc=4de005260510aaa9f1405d306b4bd32c]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=post;msg=2610290;topic=335622.0;sesc=4de005260510aaa9f1405d306b4bd32c[/url]

item.title: What server source would be best for me based off of this information
item.dc:creator: @adin99 adin99
item.description:
@adin99 wrote:

[quote=“cmckiller, post:12, topic:253802”]I’d suggest u download a great 317 that suits ur own needs then learn how to code and once youve learnt how to code well then u can do almost anything to the source.
also i think you mean when you are weilding any gs and you are stood still it moves right?
if so then i can help and just give me a buzz…

hope this has helped you mate…
happy gaming![/quote]

I want to have a gs that is two handed and the specials work
